name: 综合目录扫描与爆破
help: 带有内置字典的综合目录扫描与爆破
author: v1ll4n

params.name: types
params.description: 选择内置的字典来完成测试
params.extra_setting: {"double":true,"data":[{"key":"爆破备份文件","value":"backup"},{"key":"爆破后台","value":"admin"},{"key":"爆破 API 接口","value":"apipath"},{"key":"PHP 路径字典","value":"php"},{"key":"JSP 路径字典","value":"jsp"},{"key":"ASPX 路径字典","value":"aspx"},{"key":"MDB 数据库字典","value":"mdb-download"},{"key":"综合字典3000+","value":"misc-gt-3000"},{"key":"robots.txt top100","value":"robots-100"}]}

params.name: target
params.description: 输入想要测试的目标：支持 IP / IP:Port / URL 等，可用逗号分隔，也可用换行分隔
